Class CaravanHttpRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.caravan.io.http.request.CaravanHttpRequestBuilder

public final class CaravanHttpRequestBuilder
extends Object
    UriTemplate using HTTP request builder.
